Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Guster
Reviews.Content: Showed me the proper way to take some difficult photos and how to set up my camera.  Great training aid

Reviews.Title: Nikon School DVD
Reviews.Author: ChickenFarmer
Reviews.Content: Product was excellent.  One copy came with our camera.  We bought a second one (this one) to send to a friend.  Product is very good.  Delivery was delayed more than it should have been based on Prime membership.

Reviews.Title: have seen better
Reviews.Author: Stephen D. Ellis
Reviews.Content: this tape is just not that good you get everything put out from free photo pod cast and they are free

Reviews.Title: Basic Introduction to the camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Clear and understandable explanations about the camera. Excellent tips on using the camera for taking picture and movies.Great for beginers
